channel.title: Comments on: Introducing Kuri Vision: Never Miss a Moment
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Frank Engelman
item.dc:creator: Frank Engelman
item.description: It’s great that Kuri can recognize specific family members. What is the training process?
item.content:encoded: It’s great that Kuri can recognize specific family members. What is the training process?

item.title: By: Estella M.
item.dc:creator: Estella M.
item.description: Reminds me of Rosie from "The Jetsons"...lol.

item.title: By: Jennifer Bakos
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Bakos
item.description: Thanks! Our team has been hard at work to ensure Kuri has never looked better. ;)
item.content:encoded: Thanks! Our team has been hard at work to ensure Kuri has never looked better. 😉

item.title: By: WanderNWayne
item.dc:creator: WanderNWayne
item.description: Looking good, Kuri. You're getting smarter, too!
item.content:encoded: Looking good, Kuri. You’re getting smarter, too!
